#!/usr/bin/env python3
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
"""
μ±„ν… μ‹μ¤ν… λ°μ΄ν„°λ² μ΄μ¤ μ¤ν‚¤λ§ μƒμ„± μ¤ν¬λ¦½νΈ
"""

import sqlite3
import os
from datetime import datetime

def create_chat_schema():
    """μ±„ν… κ΄€λ ¨ ν…μ΄λΈ” μƒμ„±"""
    
    # λ°μ΄ν„°λ² μ΄μ¤ κ²½λ΅
    db_path = os.path.join(os.path.dirname(os.path.dirname(__file__)), 'data', 'attendance.db')
    
    # λ°μ΄ν„°λ² μ΄μ¤ μ—°κ²°
    conn = sqlite3.connect(db_path)
    cursor = conn.cursor()
    
    try:
        # 1. μ‚¬μ©μ ν…μ΄λΈ” (κΈ°μ΅΄ μ¶μ„ μ‹μ¤ν…κ³Ό μ—°λ™)
        cursor.execute('''
        CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS users (
            id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
            username TEXT UNIQUE NOT NULL,
            display_name TEXT NOT NULL,
            password_hash TEXT,
            role TEXT DEFAULT 'student',  -- student, teacher, admin
            created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
            last_active TIMESTAMP,
            is_active BOOLEAN DEFAULT 1
        )
        ''')
        
        # 2. μ±„ν…λ°© ν…μ΄λΈ”
        cursor.execute('''
        CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS chat_rooms (
            id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
            room_name TEXT NOT NULL,
            room_type TEXT DEFAULT 'group',  -- group, direct, class
            description TEXT,
            created_by INTEGER,
            created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
            is_active BOOLEAN DEFAULT 1,
            max_participants INTEGER DEFAULT 50,
            FOREIGN KEY (created_by) REFERENCES users(id)
        )
        ''')
        
        # 3. μ±„ν…λ°© μ°Έκ°€μ ν…μ΄λΈ”
        cursor.execute('''
        CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS chat_participants (
            id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
            room_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
            user_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
            joined_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
            last_read_message_id INTEGER,
            is_admin BOOLEAN DEFAULT 0,
            is_muted BOOLEAN DEFAULT 0,
            notification_enabled BOOLEAN DEFAULT 1,
            FOREIGN KEY (room_id) REFERENCES chat_rooms(id),
            FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id),
            UNIQUE(room_id, user_id)
        )
        ''')
        
        # 4. μ±„ν… λ©”μ‹μ§€ ν…μ΄λΈ”
        cursor.execute('''
        CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS chat_messages (
            id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
            room_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
            sender_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
            message_type TEXT DEFAULT 'text',  -- text, image, file, system
            content TEXT NOT NULL,
            file_url TEXT,
            is_edited BOOLEAN DEFAULT 0,
            edited_at TIMESTAMP,
            is_deleted BOOLEAN DEFAULT 0,
            deleted_at TIMESTAMP,
            created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
            FOREIGN KEY (room_id) REFERENCES chat_rooms(id),
            FOREIGN KEY (sender_id) REFERENCES users(id)
        )
        ''')
        
        # 5. λ©”μ‹μ§€ μ½μ μƒνƒ ν…μ΄λΈ”
        cursor.execute('''
        CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS message_read_status (
            id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
            message_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
            user_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
            read_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
            FOREIGN KEY (message_id) REFERENCES chat_messages(id),
            FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id),
            UNIQUE(message_id, user_id)
        )
        ''')
        
        # 6. μ¨λΌμΈ μƒνƒ ν…μ΄λΈ”
        cursor.execute('''
        CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS user_online_status (
            user_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
            is_online BOOLEAN DEFAULT 0,
            last_seen TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
            socket_id TEXT,
            current_room_id INTEGER,
            FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id)
        )
        ''')
        
        # μΈλ±μ¤ μƒμ„± (μ„±λ¥ μµμ ν™”)
        cursor.execute('CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_messages_room ON chat_messages(room_id, created_at DESC)')
        cursor.execute('CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_messages_sender ON chat_messages(sender_id)')
        cursor.execute('CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_participants_user ON chat_participants(user_id)')
        cursor.execute('CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_participants_room ON chat_participants(room_id)')
        
        # κΈ°λ³Έ λ°μ΄ν„° μ‚½μ…
        
        # κΈ°λ³Έ μ‚¬μ©μ μƒμ„±
        cursor.execute('''
        INSERT OR IGNORE INTO users (username, display_name, role)
        VALUES 
            ('admin', 'κ΄€λ¦¬μ', 'admin'),
            ('teacher1', 'κΉ€μ„ μƒλ‹', 'teacher'),
            ('student1', 'ν•™μƒ1', 'student'),
            ('student2', 'ν•™μƒ2', 'student')
        ''')
        
        # κΈ°λ³Έ μ±„ν…λ°© μƒμ„±
        cursor.execute('''
        INSERT OR IGNORE INTO chat_rooms (room_name, room_type, description, created_by)
        VALUES 
            ('μ „μ²΄ κ³µμ§€', 'group', 'μ „μ²΄ κ³µμ§€μ‚¬ν•­ μ±„ν…λ°©', 1),
            ('μμ  μ±„ν…', 'group', 'μμ λ΅­κ² λ€ν™”ν•λ” μ±„ν…λ°©', 1),
            ('ν•™μµ Q&A', 'group', 'ν•™μµ κ΄€λ ¨ μ§λ¬Έκ³Ό λ‹µλ³€', 2)
        ''')
        
        # κΈ°λ³Έ μ°Έκ°€μ μ„¤μ • (μ „μ²΄ κ³µμ§€λ°©μ— λ¨λ“  μ‚¬μ©μ μ¶”κ°€)
        cursor.execute('''
        INSERT OR IGNORE INTO chat_participants (room_id, user_id, is_admin)
        SELECT 1, id, CASE WHEN role IN ('admin', 'teacher') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END
        FROM users
        ''')
        
        # ν™μ λ©”μ‹μ§€ μ¶”κ°€
        cursor.execute('''
        INSERT OR IGNORE INTO chat_messages (room_id, sender_id, message_type, content)
        VALUES (1, 1, 'system', 'μ±„ν… μ‹μ¤ν…μ΄ μ‹μ‘λμ—μµλ‹λ‹¤. ν™μν•©λ‹λ‹¤!')
        ''')
        
        conn.commit()
        print("β… μ±„ν… λ°μ΄ν„°λ² μ΄μ¤ μ¤ν‚¤λ§ μƒμ„± μ™„λ£!")
        
        # μƒμ„±λ ν…μ΄λΈ” ν™•μΈ
        cursor.execute("SELECT name FROM sqlite_master WHERE type='table'")
        tables = cursor.fetchall()
        print("\nπ“ μƒμ„±λ ν…μ΄λΈ” λ©λ΅:")
        for table in tables:
            print(f"  - {table[0]}")
            
    except Exception as e:
        print(f"β μ¤ν‚¤λ§ μƒμ„± μ¤‘ μ¤λ¥ λ°μƒ: {e}")
        conn.rollback()
        
    finally:
        conn.close()

if __name__ == "__main__":
    create_chat_schema()

#!/usr/bin/env python3
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
"""
μ±„ν… μ‹μ¤ν… λ°μ΄ν„°λ² μ΄μ¤ μ¤ν‚¤λ§ μƒμ„± μ¤ν¬λ¦½νΈ
"""

import sqlite3
import os
from datetime import datetime

def create_chat_schema():
    """μ±„ν… κ΄€λ ¨ ν…μ΄λΈ” μƒμ„±"""
    
    # λ°μ΄ν„°λ² μ΄μ¤ κ²½λ΅
    db_path = os.path.join(os.path.dirname(os.path.dirname(__file__)), 'data', 'attendance.db')
    
    # λ°μ΄ν„°λ² μ΄μ¤ μ—°κ²°
    conn = sqlite3.connect(db_path)
    cursor = conn.cursor()
    
    try:
        # 1. μ‚¬μ©μ ν…μ΄λΈ” (κΈ°μ΅΄ μ¶μ„ μ‹μ¤ν…κ³Ό μ—°λ™)
        cursor.execute('''
        CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS users (
            id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
            username TEXT UNIQUE NOT NULL,
            display_name TEXT NOT NULL,
            password_hash TEXT,
            role TEXT DEFAULT 'student',  -- student, teacher, admin
            created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
            last_active TIMESTAMP,
            is_active BOOLEAN DEFAULT 1
        )
        ''')
        
        # 2. μ±„ν…λ°© ν…μ΄λΈ”
        cursor.execute('''
        CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS chat_rooms (
            id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
            room_name TEXT NOT NULL,
            room_type TEXT DEFAULT 'group',  -- group, direct, class
            description TEXT,
            created_by INTEGER,
            created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
            is_active BOOLEAN DEFAULT 1,
            max_participants INTEGER DEFAULT 50,
            FOREIGN KEY (created_by) REFERENCES users(id)
        )
        ''')
        
        # 3. μ±„ν…λ°© μ°Έκ°€μ ν…μ΄λΈ”
        cursor.execute('''
        CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS chat_participants (
            id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
            room_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
            user_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
            joined_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
            last_read_message_id INTEGER,
            is_admin BOOLEAN DEFAULT 0,
            is_muted BOOLEAN DEFAULT 0,
            notification_enabled BOOLEAN DEFAULT 1,
            FOREIGN KEY (room_id) REFERENCES chat_rooms(id),
            FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id),
            UNIQUE(room_id, user_id)
        )
        ''')
        
        # 4. μ±„ν… λ©”μ‹μ§€ ν…μ΄λΈ”
        cursor.execute('''
        CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS chat_messages (
            id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
            room_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
            sender_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
            message_type TEXT DEFAULT 'text',  -- text, image, file, system
            content TEXT NOT NULL,
            file_url TEXT,
            is_edited BOOLEAN DEFAULT 0,
            edited_at TIMESTAMP,
            is_deleted BOOLEAN DEFAULT 0,
            deleted_at TIMESTAMP,
            created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
            FOREIGN KEY (room_id) REFERENCES chat_rooms(id),
            FOREIGN KEY (sender_id) REFERENCES users(id)
        )
        ''')
        
        # 5. λ©”μ‹μ§€ μ½μ μƒνƒ ν…μ΄λΈ”
        cursor.execute('''
        CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS message_read_status (
            id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
            message_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
            user_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
            read_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
            FOREIGN KEY (message_id) REFERENCES chat_messages(id),
            FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id),
            UNIQUE(message_id, user_id)
        )
        ''')
        
        # 6. μ¨λΌμΈ μƒνƒ ν…μ΄λΈ”
        cursor.execute('''
        CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS user_online_status (
            user_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
            is_online BOOLEAN DEFAULT 0,
            last_seen TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
            socket_id TEXT,
            current_room_id INTEGER,
            FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id)
        )
        ''')
        
        # μΈλ±μ¤ μƒμ„± (μ„±λ¥ μµμ ν™”)
        cursor.execute('CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_messages_room ON chat_messages(room_id, created_at DESC)')
        cursor.execute('CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_messages_sender ON chat_messages(sender_id)')
        cursor.execute('CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_participants_user ON chat_participants(user_id)')
        cursor.execute('CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_participants_room ON chat_participants(room_id)')
        
        # κΈ°λ³Έ λ°μ΄ν„° μ‚½μ…
        
        # κΈ°λ³Έ μ‚¬μ©μ μƒμ„±
        cursor.execute('''
        INSERT OR IGNORE INTO users (username, display_name, role)
        VALUES 
            ('admin', 'κ΄€λ¦¬μ', 'admin'),
            ('teacher1', 'κΉ€μ„ μƒλ‹', 'teacher'),
            ('student1', 'ν•™μƒ1', 'student'),
            ('student2', 'ν•™μƒ2', 'student')
        ''')
        
        # κΈ°λ³Έ μ±„ν…λ°© μƒμ„±
        cursor.execute('''
        INSERT OR IGNORE INTO chat_rooms (room_name, room_type, description, created_by)
        VALUES 
            ('μ „μ²΄ κ³µμ§€', 'group', 'μ „μ²΄ κ³µμ§€μ‚¬ν•­ μ±„ν…λ°©', 1),
            ('μμ  μ±„ν…', 'group', 'μμ λ΅­κ² λ€ν™”ν•λ” μ±„ν…λ°©', 1),
            ('ν•™μµ Q&A', 'group', 'ν•™μµ κ΄€λ ¨ μ§λ¬Έκ³Ό λ‹µλ³€', 2)
        ''')
        
        # κΈ°λ³Έ μ°Έκ°€μ μ„¤μ • (μ „μ²΄ κ³µμ§€λ°©μ— λ¨λ“  μ‚¬μ©μ μ¶”κ°€)
        cursor.execute('''
        INSERT OR IGNORE INTO chat_participants (room_id, user_id, is_admin)
        SELECT 1, id, CASE WHEN role IN ('admin', 'teacher') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END
        FROM users
        ''')
        
        # ν™μ λ©”μ‹μ§€ μ¶”κ°€
        cursor.execute('''
        INSERT OR IGNORE INTO chat_messages (room_id, sender_id, message_type, content)
        VALUES (1, 1, 'system', 'μ±„ν… μ‹μ¤ν…μ΄ μ‹μ‘λμ—μµλ‹λ‹¤. ν™μν•©λ‹λ‹¤!')
        ''')
        
        conn.commit()
        print("β… μ±„ν… λ°μ΄ν„°λ² μ΄μ¤ μ¤ν‚¤λ§ μƒμ„± μ™„λ£!")
        
        # μƒμ„±λ ν…μ΄λΈ” ν™•μΈ
        cursor.execute("SELECT name FROM sqlite_master WHERE type='table'")
        tables = cursor.fetchall()
        print("\nπ“ μƒμ„±λ ν…μ΄λΈ” λ©λ΅:")
        for table in tables:
            print(f"  - {table[0]}")
            
    except Exception as e:
        print(f"β μ¤ν‚¤λ§ μƒμ„± μ¤‘ μ¤λ¥ λ°μƒ: {e}")
        conn.rollback()
        
    finally:
        conn.close()

if __name__ == "__main__":
    create_chat_schema()

from flask import Flask, render_template, jsonify, request
from flask_cors import CORS
from flask_socketio import SocketIO, emit
import sqlite3
import json
from datetime import datetime, timedelta
import os
import threading
import time

app = Flask(__name__, 
            static_folder='../frontend/static',
            template_folder='../frontend/templates')
CORS(app)
socketio = SocketIO(app, cors_allowed_origins="*")

# μ„¤μ • νμΌ λ΅λ“
with open('../config.json', 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f:
    config = json.load(f)

def get_db_connection():
    """λ°μ΄ν„°λ² μ΄μ¤ μ—°κ²°"""
    db_path = os.path.join('..', config['database']['path'])
    conn = sqlite3.connect(db_path)
    conn.row_factory = sqlite3.Row
    return conn

@app.route('/')
def index():
    """λ©”μΈ λ€μ‹λ³΄λ“ νμ΄μ§€"""
    return render_template('dashboard.html')

@app.route('/api/attendance/current')
def get_current_attendance():
    """ν„μ¬ μ¶μ„ μ¤‘μΈ ν•™μƒ λ©λ΅"""
    conn = get_db_connection()
    cursor = conn.cursor()
    
    # μ¤λ μ¶μ„ν• ν•™μƒ μ¤‘ attending μƒνƒμΈ ν•™μƒλ“¤
    today = datetime.now().strftime('%Y-%m-%d')
    students = cursor.execute('''
        SELECT 
            student_id,
            student_name,
            check_in_time,
            expected_end_time,
            class_duration_minutes,
            status,
            CASE 
                WHEN datetime(expected_end_time) <= datetime('now', '+10 minutes') THEN 'ending_soon'

def background_refresh():

# μ¨λΌμΈ μ‚¬μ©μ κ΄€λ¦¬
online_users = {}

# WebSocket μ΄λ²¤νΈ ν•Έλ“¤λ¬
@socketio.on('connect')
def handle_connect():
    emit('connected', {'data': 'Connected to monitoring system'})

@socketio.on('disconnect')
def handle_disconnect():
    print('Client disconnected')
    # μ¨λΌμΈ μƒνƒ μ—…λ°μ΄νΈ
    if request.sid in online_users:
        user_id = online_users[request.sid]
        update_user_offline_status(user_id)
        del online_users[request.sid]

# === μ±„ν… κ΄€λ ¨ WebSocket μ΄λ²¤νΈ ===

@socketio.on('join_chat')
def handle_join_chat(data):
    """μ±„ν…λ°© μ…μ¥"""
    try:
        user_id = data.get('user_id')
        room_id = data.get('room_id')
        
        if not user_id or not room_id:
            emit('error', {'message': 'user_idμ™€ room_idκ°€ ν•„μ”ν•©λ‹λ‹¤'})
            return
            
        # μ‚¬μ©μ μ¨λΌμΈ μƒνƒ μ—…λ°μ΄νΈ
        online_users[request.sid] = user_id
        update_user_online_status(user_id, request.sid, room_id)
        
        # μ±„ν…λ°© μ…μ¥ μ²λ¦¬
        join_chat_room(user_id, room_id)
        
        # μµκ·Ό λ©”μ‹μ§€ κ°€μ Έμ¤κΈ°
        messages = get_recent_messages(room_id, limit=50)
        
        emit('joined_chat', {
            'room_id': room_id,
            'messages': messages,
            'user_id': user_id
        })
        
        # λ‹¤λ¥Έ μ‚¬μ©μλ“¤μ—κ² μ…μ¥ μ•λ¦Ό
        socketio.emit('user_joined', {
            'room_id': room_id,
            'user_id': user_id,
            'timestamp': datetime.now().isoformat()
        }, room=f"room_{room_id}")
        
    except Exception as e:
        emit('error', {'message': f'μ±„ν…λ°© μ…μ¥ μ‹¤ν¨: {str(e)}'})

@socketio.on('send_message')
def handle_send_message(data):
    """λ©”μ‹μ§€ μ „μ†΅"""
    try:
        user_id = data.get('user_id')
        room_id = data.get('room_id')
        content = data.get('content')
        message_type = data.get('message_type', 'text')
        
        if not all([user_id, room_id, content]):
            emit('error', {'message': 'ν•„μ λ°μ΄ν„°κ°€ λ„λ½λμ—μµλ‹λ‹¤'})
            return
            
        # λ©”μ‹μ§€ λ°μ΄ν„°λ² μ΄μ¤μ— μ €μ¥
        message = save_message(user_id, room_id, content, message_type)
        
        if message:
            # μ±„ν…λ°©μ λ¨λ“  μ‚¬μ©μμ—κ² λ©”μ‹μ§€ μ „μ†΅
            socketio.emit('new_message', {
                'id': message['id'],
                'room_id': room_id,
                'sender_id': user_id,
                'sender_name': message['sender_name'],
                'content': content,
                'message_type': message_type,
                'created_at': message['created_at']
            }, room=f"room_{room_id}")
            
            emit('message_sent', {'success': True, 'message_id': message['id']})
        else:
            emit('error', {'message': 'λ©”μ‹μ§€ μ €μ¥ μ‹¤ν¨'})
            
    except Exception as e:
        emit('error', {'message': f'λ©”μ‹μ§€ μ „μ†΅ μ‹¤ν¨: {str(e)}'})

@socketio.on('leave_chat')
def handle_leave_chat(data):
    """μ±„ν…λ°© ν‡΄μ¥"""
    try:
        user_id = data.get('user_id')
        room_id = data.get('room_id')
        
        if user_id and room_id:
            # λ‹¤λ¥Έ μ‚¬μ©μλ“¤μ—κ² ν‡΄μ¥ μ•λ¦Ό
            socketio.emit('user_left', {
                'room_id': room_id,
                'user_id': user_id,
                'timestamp': datetime.now().isoformat()
            }, room=f"room_{room_id}")
            
            # μ‚¬μ©μ μƒνƒ μ—…λ°μ΄νΈ
            update_user_online_status(user_id, request.sid, None)
            
        emit('left_chat', {'room_id': room_id})
        
    except Exception as e:
        emit('error', {'message': f'μ±„ν…λ°© ν‡΄μ¥ μ‹¤ν¨: {str(e)}'})

@socketio.on('typing')
def handle_typing(data):
    """νƒ€μ΄ν•‘ μƒνƒ μ „μ†΅"""
    try:
        user_id = data.get('user_id')
        room_id = data.get('room_id')
        is_typing = data.get('is_typing', False)
        
        if user_id and room_id:
            socketio.emit('user_typing', {
                'room_id': room_id,
                'user_id': user_id,
                'is_typing': is_typing,
                'timestamp': datetime.now().isoformat()
            }, room=f"room_{room_id}")
            
    except Exception as e:
        pass  # νƒ€μ΄ν•‘ μƒνƒλ” μ—λ¬κ°€ λ°μƒν•΄λ„ λ¬΄μ‹

# === μ±„ν… κ΄€λ ¨ ν—¬νΌ ν•¨μ ===

def update_user_online_status(user_id, socket_id, room_id):
    """μ‚¬μ©μ μ¨λΌμΈ μƒνƒ μ—…λ°μ΄νΈ"""
    conn = get_db_connection()
    cursor = conn.cursor()
    
    cursor.execute('''
        INSERT OR REPLACE INTO user_online_status 
        (user_id, is_online, last_seen, socket_id, current_room_id)
        VALUES (?, ?, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, ?, ?)
    ''', (user_id, 1, socket_id, room_id))
    
    conn.commit()
    conn.close()

def update_user_offline_status(user_id):
    """μ‚¬μ©μ μ¤ν”„λΌμΈ μƒνƒ μ—…λ°μ΄νΈ"""
    conn = get_db_connection()
    cursor = conn.cursor()
    
    cursor.execute('''
        UPDATE user_online_status 
        SET is_online = 0, last_seen = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, socket_id = NULL, current_room_id = NULL
        WHERE user_id = ?
    ''', (user_id,))
    
    conn.commit()
    conn.close()

def join_chat_room(user_id, room_id):
    """μ±„ν…λ°© μ°Έκ°€μλ΅ μ¶”κ°€ (μ΄λ―Έ μμΌλ©΄ λ¬΄μ‹)"""
    conn = get_db_connection()
    cursor = conn.cursor()
    
    cursor.execute('''
        INSERT OR IGNORE INTO chat_participants (room_id, user_id)
        VALUES (?, ?)
    ''', (room_id, user_id))
    
    conn.commit()
    conn.close()

def get_recent_messages(room_id, limit=50):
    """μ±„ν…λ°©μ μµκ·Ό λ©”μ‹μ§€ κ°€μ Έμ¤κΈ°"""
    conn = get_db_connection()
    cursor = conn.cursor()
    
    messages = cursor.execute('''
        SELECT 
            m.id,
            m.sender_id,
            u.display_name as sender_name,
            m.content,
            m.message_type,
            m.created_at
        FROM chat_messages m
        JOIN users u ON m.sender_id = u.id
        WHERE m.room_id = ? AND m.is_deleted = 0
        ORDER BY m.created_at DESC
        LIMIT ?
    ''', (room_id, limit)).fetchall()
    
    conn.close()
    
    # μµμ‹  μμΌλ΅ μ •λ ¬
    return [dict(msg) for msg in reversed(messages)]

def save_message(user_id, room_id, content, message_type='text'):
    """λ©”μ‹μ§€λ¥Ό λ°μ΄ν„°λ² μ΄μ¤μ— μ €μ¥"""
    conn = get_db_connection()
    cursor = conn.cursor()
    
    # λ©”μ‹μ§€ μ €μ¥
    cursor.execute('''
        INSERT INTO chat_messages (room_id, sender_id, content, message_type)
        VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?)
    ''', (room_id, user_id, content, message_type))
    
    message_id = cursor.lastrowid
    
    # λ°μ†΅μ μ •λ³΄ κ°€μ Έμ¤κΈ°
    sender = cursor.execute('''
        SELECT display_name FROM users WHERE id = ?
    ''', (user_id,)).fetchone()
    
    conn.commit()
    conn.close()
    
    return {
        'id': message_id,
        'sender_name': sender['display_name'] if sender else 'Unknown',
        'created_at': datetime.now().isoformat()
    }

        online_users[request.sid] = user_id

def handle_send_message(data):

        user_id = data.get('user_id')

def update_user_online_status(user_id, socket_id, room_id):
    """μ‚¬μ©μ μ¨λΌμΈ μƒνƒ μ—…λ°μ΄νΈ"""
    conn = get_db_connection()
    cursor = conn.cursor()
    
    cursor.execute('''
        INSERT OR REPLACE INTO user_online_status 
        (user_id, is_online, last_seen, socket_id, current_room_id)
        VALUES (?, ?, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, ?, ?)
    ''', (user_id, 1, socket_id, room_id))
    
    conn.commit()
    conn.close()

def update_user_offline_status(user_id):
    """μ‚¬μ©μ μ¤ν”„λΌμΈ μƒνƒ μ—…λ°μ΄νΈ"""
    conn = get_db_connection()
    cursor = conn.cursor()
    
    cursor.execute('''
        UPDATE user_online_status 
        SET is_online = 0, last_seen = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, socket_id = NULL, current_room_id = NULL
        WHERE user_id = ?
    ''', (user_id,))
    
    conn.commit()
    conn.close()

def join_chat_room(user_id, room_id):
    """μ±„ν…λ°© μ°Έκ°€μλ΅ μ¶”κ°€ (μ΄λ―Έ μμΌλ©΄ λ¬΄μ‹)"""
    conn = get_db_connection()
    cursor = conn.cursor()
    
    cursor.execute('''
        INSERT OR IGNORE INTO chat_participants (room_id, user_id)
        VALUES (?, ?)
    ''', (room_id, user_id))
    
    conn.commit()
    conn.close()

def get_recent_messages(room_id, limit=50):
    """μ±„ν…λ°©μ μµκ·Ό λ©”μ‹μ§€ κ°€μ Έμ¤κΈ°"""
    conn = get_db_connection()
    cursor = conn.cursor()
    
    messages = cursor.execute('''
        SELECT 
            m.id,
            m.sender_id,
            u.display_name as sender_name,
            m.content,
            m.message_type,
            m.created_at
        FROM chat_messages m
        JOIN users u ON m.sender_id = u.id
        WHERE m.room_id = ? AND m.is_deleted = 0
        ORDER BY m.created_at DESC
        LIMIT ?
    ''', (room_id, limit)).fetchall()
    
    conn.close()
    
    # μµμ‹  μμΌλ΅ μ •λ ¬
    return [dict(msg) for msg in reversed(messages)]

def save_message(user_id, room_id, content, message_type='text'):
    """λ©”μ‹μ§€λ¥Ό λ°μ΄ν„°λ² μ΄μ¤μ— μ €μ¥"""
    conn = get_db_connection()
    cursor = conn.cursor()
    
    # λ©”μ‹μ§€ μ €μ¥
    cursor.execute('''
        INSERT INTO chat_messages (room_id, sender_id, content, message_type)
        VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?)
    ''', (room_id, user_id, content, message_type))
    
    message_id = cursor.lastrowid
    
    # λ°μ†΅μ μ •λ³΄ κ°€μ Έμ¤κΈ°
    sender = cursor.execute('''
        SELECT display_name FROM users WHERE id = ?
    ''', (user_id,)).fetchone()
    
    conn.commit()
    conn.close()
    
    return {
        'id': message_id,
        'sender_name': sender['display_name'] if sender else 'Unknown',
        'created_at': datetime.now().isoformat()
    }

from flask import Flask, render_template, jsonify, request
from flask_cors import CORS

import sqlite3
import json
from datetime import datetime, timedelta

app = Flask(__name__,

CORS(app)

# μ„¤μ • νμΌ λ΅λ“
with open('../config.json', 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f:
    config = json.load(f)

def get_db_connection():
    """λ°μ΄ν„°λ² μ΄μ¤ μ—°κ²°"""
    db_path = os.path.join('..', config['database']['path'])
    conn = sqlite3.connect(db_path)

@app.route('/')
def index():
    """λ©”μΈ λ€μ‹λ³΄λ“ νμ΄μ§€"""

@app.route('/api/attendance/current')
def get_current_attendance():
    """ν„μ¬ μ¶μ„ μ¤‘μΈ ν•™μƒ λ©λ΅"""
    conn = get_db_connection()
    cursor = conn.cursor()
    
    # μ¤λ μ¶μ„ν• ν•™μƒ μ¤‘ attending μƒνƒμΈ ν•™μƒλ“¤
    today = datetime.now().strftime('%Y-%m-%d')
    students = cursor.execute('''
        SELECT 
            student_id,
            student_name,
            check_in_time,
            expected_end_time,
            class_duration_minutes,
            status,
            CASE 
                WHEN datetime(expected_end_time) <= datetime('now', '+10 minutes') THEN 'ending_soon'
                WHEN datetime(expected_end_time) <= datetime('now') THEN 'overtime'
                ELSE 'normal'
            END as alert_status
        FROM attendance 
        WHERE DATE(check_in_time) = DATE('now', 'localtime')
        AND status = 'attending'
        ORDER BY check_in_time DESC
    ''').fetchall()
    
    conn.close()
    
    result = []
    for student in students:
        check_in = datetime.fromisoformat(student['check_in_time'])
        expected_end = datetime.fromisoformat(student['expected_end_time'])
        now = datetime.now()
        
        # λ‚¨μ€ μ‹κ°„ κ³„μ‚°
        remaining_minutes = int((expected_end - now).total_seconds() / 60)
        
        result.append({
            'student_id': student['student_id'],
            'student_name': student['student_name'],
            'check_in_time': check_in.strftime('%H:%M'),
            'expected_end_time': expected_end.strftime('%H:%M'),
            'duration_minutes': student['class_duration_minutes'],
            'remaining_minutes': remaining_minutes,
            'alert_status': student['alert_status'],
            'status': student['status']
        })
    
    return jsonify(result)

@app.route('/api/attendance/history')
def get_attendance_history():
    """μ¶μ„ νμ¤ν† λ¦¬ μ΅°ν"""
    date = request.args.get('date', datetime.now().strftime('%Y-%m-%d'))
    
    conn = get_db_connection()
    cursor = conn.cursor()
    
    students = cursor.execute('''
        SELECT * FROM attendance 
        WHERE DATE(check_in_time) = ?
        ORDER BY check_in_time DESC
    ''', (date,)).fetchall()
    
    conn.close()
    
    result = []
    for student in students:
        result.append({
            'student_id': student['student_id'],
            'student_name': student['student_name'],
            'check_in_time': student['check_in_time'],
            'expected_end_time': student['expected_end_time'],
            'actual_end_time': student['actual_end_time'],
            'status': student['status']
        })
    
    return jsonify(result)

@app.route('/api/notifications')
def get_notifications():
    """μµκ·Ό μ•λ¦Ό λ©λ΅"""

    notifications = cursor.execute('''

@app.route('/api/student/<student_id>/end', methods=['POST'])
def end_student_session(student_id):
    """ν•™μƒ μμ—… μΆ…λ£ μ²λ¦¬"""
    conn = get_db_connection()
    cursor = conn.cursor()
    
    cursor.execute('''
        UPDATE attendance 
        SET status = 'completed', 
            actual_end_time = datetime('now', 'localtime')
        WHERE student_id = ? 
        AND DATE(check_in_time) = DATE('now', 'localtime')
        AND status = 'attending'
    ''', (student_id,))
    
    conn.commit()
    conn.close()
    
    # μ‹¤μ‹κ°„ μ—…λ°μ΄νΈ μ•λ¦Ό
    socketio.emit('student_ended', {'student_id': student_id})
    
    return jsonify({'success': True})

@app.route('/api/student/<student_id>/extend', methods=['POST'])
def extend_student_session(student_id):
    """ν•™μƒ μμ—… μ‹κ°„ μ—°μ¥"""
    minutes = request.json.get('minutes', 30)
    
    conn = get_db_connection()
    cursor = conn.cursor()
    
    cursor.execute('''
        UPDATE attendance 
        SET expected_end_time = datetime(expected_end_time, '+' || ? || ' minutes'),
            class_duration_minutes = class_duration_minutes + ?
        WHERE student_id = ? 
        AND DATE(check_in_time) = DATE('now', 'localtime')
        AND status = 'attending'
    ''', (minutes, minutes, student_id))
    
    conn.commit()
    conn.close()
    
    # μ‹¤μ‹κ°„ μ—…λ°μ΄νΈ μ•λ¦Ό
    socketio.emit('student_extended', {'student_id': student_id, 'minutes': minutes})
    
    return jsonify({'success': True})

@app.route('/api/stats/today')
def get_today_stats():
    """μ¤λμ ν†µκ³„"""
    conn = get_db_connection()
    cursor = conn.cursor()
    
    # μ „μ²΄ μ¶μ„ ν•™μƒ μ
    total_students = cursor.execute('''
        SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT student_id) as count
        FROM attendance 
        WHERE DATE(check_in_time) = DATE('now', 'localtime')
    ''').fetchone()['count']
    
    # ν„μ¬ μμ—… μ¤‘μΈ ν•™μƒ μ
    current_students = cursor.execute('''
        SELECT COUNT(*) as count
        FROM attendance 
        WHERE DATE(check_in_time) = DATE('now', 'localtime')
        AND status = 'attending'
    ''').fetchone()['count']
    
    # μΆ…λ£ μ„λ°• ν•™μƒ μ
    ending_soon = cursor.execute('''
        SELECT COUNT(*) as count
        FROM attendance 
        WHERE DATE(check_in_time) = DATE('now', 'localtime')
        AND status = 'attending'
        AND datetime(expected_end_time) <= datetime('now', '+10 minutes')
    ''').fetchone()['count']
    
    conn.close()
    
    return jsonify({
        'total_students': total_students,
        'current_students': current_students,
        'ending_soon': ending_soon,
        'completed_students': total_students - current_students
    })

def background_refresh():
    """λ°±κ·ΈλΌμ΄λ“μ—μ„ μ£ΌκΈ°μ μΌλ΅ λ°μ΄ν„° μ—…λ°μ΄νΈ μ•λ¦Ό"""
    while True:
        time.sleep(config['web_dashboard']['auto_refresh_seconds'])
        socketio.emit('refresh_data', {'timestamp': datetime.now().isoformat()})

@app.route('/api/chat/rooms')
def get_chat_rooms():
    """μ±„ν…λ°© λ©λ΅ μ΅°ν"""
    conn = get_db_connection()
    cursor = conn.cursor()
    
    rooms = cursor.execute('''
        SELECT 
            r.id,
            r.room_name,
            r.room_type,
            r.description,
            r.created_at,
            COUNT(p.user_id) as participant_count,
            u.display_name as creator_name
        FROM chat_rooms r
        LEFT JOIN chat_participants p ON r.id = p.room_id
        LEFT JOIN users u ON r.created_by = u.id
        WHERE r.is_active = 1
        GROUP BY r.id
        ORDER BY r.created_at DESC
    ''').fetchall()
    
    conn.close()
    
    return jsonify([dict(room) for room in rooms])

@app.route('/api/chat/rooms/<int:room_id>/messages')
def get_room_messages(room_id):
    """μ±„ν…λ°© λ©”μ‹μ§€ μ΅°ν (νμ΄μ§€λ„¤μ΄μ… μ§€μ›)"""
    page = request.args.get('page', 1, type=int)
    limit = request.args.get('limit', 50, type=int)
    offset = (page - 1) * limit
    
    conn = get_db_connection()
    cursor = conn.cursor()
    
    messages = cursor.execute('''
        SELECT 
            m.id,
            m.sender_id,
            u.display_name as sender_name,
            m.content,
            m.message_type,
            m.is_edited,
            m.created_at
        FROM chat_messages m
        JOIN users u ON m.sender_id = u.id
        WHERE m.room_id = ? AND m.is_deleted = 0
        ORDER BY m.created_at DESC
        LIMIT ? OFFSET ?
    ''', (room_id, limit, offset)).fetchall()
    
    # μ΄ λ©”μ‹μ§€ μ μ΅°ν
    total_count = cursor.execute('''
        SELECT COUNT(*) as count
        FROM chat_messages
        WHERE room_id = ? AND is_deleted = 0
    ''', (room_id,)).fetchone()['count']
    
    conn.close()
    
    return jsonify({
        'messages': [dict(msg) for msg in reversed(messages)],
        'pagination': {
            'page': page,
            'limit': limit,
            'total': total_count,
            'has_more': total_count > page * limit
        }
    })

@app.route('/api/chat/rooms/<int:room_id>/participants')
def get_room_participants(room_id):
    """μ±„ν…λ°© μ°Έκ°€μ λ©λ΅ μ΅°ν"""
    conn = get_db_connection()
    cursor = conn.cursor()
    
    participants = cursor.execute('''
        SELECT 
            u.id,
            u.display_name,
            u.role,
            p.joined_at,
            p.is_admin,
            p.is_muted,
            o.is_online,
            o.last_seen
        FROM chat_participants p
        JOIN users u ON p.user_id = u.id
        LEFT JOIN user_online_status o ON u.id = o.user_id
        WHERE p.room_id = ?
        ORDER BY o.is_online DESC, u.display_name
    ''', (room_id,)).fetchall()
    
    conn.close()
    
    return jsonify([dict(participant) for participant in participants])

@app.route('/api/chat/users/<int:user_id>/rooms')
def get_user_rooms(user_id):
    """μ‚¬μ©μκ°€ μ°Έμ—¬ μ¤‘μΈ μ±„ν…λ°© λ©λ΅ μ΅°ν"""
    conn = get_db_connection()
    cursor = conn.cursor()
    
    rooms = cursor.execute('''
        SELECT 
            r.id,
            r.room_name,
            r.room_type,
            r.description,
            p.joined_at,
            p.last_read_message_id,
            (
                SELECT COUNT(*)
                FROM chat_messages m
                WHERE m.room_id = r.id 
                AND m.id > COALESCE(p.last_read_message_id, 0)
                AND m.is_deleted = 0
            ) as unread_count,
            (
                SELECT m.content
                FROM chat_messages m
                WHERE m.room_id = r.id AND m.is_deleted = 0
                ORDER BY m.created_at DESC
                LIMIT 1
            ) as last_message
        FROM chat_participants p
        JOIN chat_rooms r ON p.room_id = r.id
        WHERE p.user_id = ? AND r.is_active = 1
        ORDER BY p.joined_at DESC
    ''', (user_id,)).fetchall()
    
    conn.close()
    
    return jsonify([dict(room) for room in rooms])

@app.route('/api/chat/users')
def get_users():
    """μ‚¬μ©μ λ©λ΅ μ΅°ν (μ±„ν…λ°© μ΄λ€μ©)"""
    conn = get_db_connection()

# === μ±„ν… κ΄€λ ¨ REST API ===

@app.route('/api/chat/rooms')
def get_chat_rooms():
    """μ±„ν…λ°© λ©λ΅ μ΅°ν"""
    conn = get_db_connection()
    cursor = conn.cursor()
    
    rooms = cursor.execute('''
        SELECT 
            r.id,
            r.room_name,
            r.room_type,
            r.description,
            r.created_at,
            COUNT(p.user_id) as participant_count,
            u.display_name as creator_name
        FROM chat_rooms r
        LEFT JOIN chat_participants p ON r.id = p.room_id
        LEFT JOIN users u ON r.created_by = u.id
        WHERE r.is_active = 1
        GROUP BY r.id
        ORDER BY r.created_at DESC
    ''').fetchall()
    
    conn.close()
    
    return jsonify([dict(room) for room in rooms])

@app.route('/api/chat/rooms/<int:room_id>/messages')
def get_room_messages(room_id):
    """μ±„ν…λ°© λ©”μ‹μ§€ μ΅°ν (νμ΄μ§€λ„¤μ΄μ… μ§€μ›)"""
    page = request.args.get('page', 1, type=int)
    limit = request.args.get('limit', 50, type=int)
    offset = (page - 1) * limit
    
    conn = get_db_connection()
    cursor = conn.cursor()
    
    messages = cursor.execute('''
        SELECT 
            m.id,
            m.sender_id,
            u.display_name as sender_name,
            m.content,
            m.message_type,
            m.is_edited,
            m.created_at
        FROM chat_messages m
        JOIN users u ON m.sender_id = u.id
        WHERE m.room_id = ? AND m.is_deleted = 0
        ORDER BY m.created_at DESC
        LIMIT ? OFFSET ?
    ''', (room_id, limit, offset)).fetchall()
    
    # μ΄ λ©”μ‹μ§€ μ μ΅°ν
    total_count = cursor.execute('''
        SELECT COUNT(*) as count
        FROM chat_messages
        WHERE room_id = ? AND is_deleted = 0
    ''', (room_id,)).fetchone()['count']
    
    conn.close()
    
    return jsonify({
        'messages': [dict(msg) for msg in reversed(messages)],
        'pagination': {
            'page': page,
            'limit': limit,
            'total': total_count,
            'has_more': total_count > page * limit
        }
    })

@app.route('/api/chat/rooms/<int:room_id>/participants')
def get_room_participants(room_id):
    """μ±„ν…λ°© μ°Έκ°€μ λ©λ΅ μ΅°ν"""
    conn = get_db_connection()
    cursor = conn.cursor()
    
    participants = cursor.execute('''
        SELECT 
            u.id,
            u.display_name,
            u.role,
            p.joined_at,
            p.is_admin,
            p.is_muted,
            o.is_online,
            o.last_seen
        FROM chat_participants p
        JOIN users u ON p.user_id = u.id
        LEFT JOIN user_online_status o ON u.id = o.user_id
        WHERE p.room_id = ?
        ORDER BY o.is_online DESC, u.display_name
    ''', (room_id,)).fetchall()
    
    conn.close()
    
    return jsonify([dict(participant) for participant in participants])

@app.route('/api/chat/users/<int:user_id>/rooms')
def get_user_rooms(user_id):
    """μ‚¬μ©μκ°€ μ°Έμ—¬ μ¤‘μΈ μ±„ν…λ°© λ©λ΅ μ΅°ν"""
    conn = get_db_connection()
    cursor = conn.cursor()
    
    rooms = cursor.execute('''
        SELECT 
            r.id,
            r.room_name,
            r.room_type,
            r.description,
            p.joined_at,
            p.last_read_message_id,
            (
                SELECT COUNT(*)
                FROM chat_messages m
                WHERE m.room_id = r.id 
                AND m.id > COALESCE(p.last_read_message_id, 0)
                AND m.is_deleted = 0
            ) as unread_count,
            (
                SELECT m.content
                FROM chat_messages m
                WHERE m.room_id = r.id AND m.is_deleted = 0
                ORDER BY m.created_at DESC
                LIMIT 1
            ) as last_message
        FROM chat_participants p
        JOIN chat_rooms r ON p.room_id = r.id
        WHERE p.user_id = ? AND r.is_active = 1
        ORDER BY p.joined_at DESC
    ''', (user_id,)).fetchall()
    
    conn.close()
    
    return jsonify([dict(room) for room in rooms])

@app.route('/api/chat/users')
def get_users():
    """μ‚¬μ©μ λ©λ΅ μ΅°ν (μ±„ν…λ°© μ΄λ€μ©)"""
    conn = get_db_connection()
    cursor = conn.cursor()
    
    users = cursor.execute('''
        SELECT 
            u.id,
            u.username,
            u.display_name,
            u.role,
            o.is_online,
            o.last_seen
        FROM users u
        LEFT JOIN user_online_status o ON u.id = o.user_id
        WHERE u.is_active = 1
        ORDER BY o.is_online DESC, u.display_name
    ''').fetchall()
    
    conn.close()
    
    return jsonify([dict(user) for user in users])

@app.route('/api/chat/rooms', methods=['POST'])
def create_chat_room():
    """μƒ μ±„ν…λ°© μƒμ„±"""
    data = request.get_json()
    
    room_name = data.get('room_name')
    room_type = data.get('room_type', 'group')
    description = data.get('description', '')
    created_by = data.get('created_by')
    
    if not room_name or not created_by:
        return jsonify({'error': 'room_nameκ³Ό created_byλ” ν•„μμ…λ‹λ‹¤'}), 400
    
    conn = get_db_connection()
    cursor = conn.cursor()
    
    try:
        # μ±„ν…λ°© μƒμ„±
        cursor.execute('''
            INSERT INTO chat_rooms (room_name, room_type, description, created_by)
            VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?)
        ''', (room_name, room_type, description, created_by))
        
        room_id = cursor.lastrowid
        
        # μƒμ„±μλ¥Ό κ΄€λ¦¬μλ΅ μ°Έκ°€μμ— μ¶”κ°€
        cursor.execute('''
            INSERT INTO chat_participants (room_id, user_id, is_admin)
            VALUES (?, ?, 1)
        ''', (room_id, created_by))
        
        conn.commit()
        
        return jsonify({
            'success': True,
            'room_id': room_id,
            'room_name': room_name
        })
        
    except Exception as e:
        conn.rollback()
        return jsonify({'error': f'μ±„ν…λ°© μƒμ„± μ‹¤ν¨: {str(e)}'}), 500
        
    finally:
        conn.close()

@app.route('/api/chat/rooms/<int:room_id>/join', methods=['POST'])
def join_room(room_id):
    """μ±„ν…λ°© μ°Έκ°€"""
    data = request.get_json()
    user_id = data.get('user_id')
    
    if not user_id:
        return jsonify({'error': 'user_idκ°€ ν•„μ”ν•©λ‹λ‹¤'}), 400
    
    conn = get_db_connection()
    cursor = conn.cursor()
    
    try:
        # μ΄λ―Έ μ°Έκ°€ μ¤‘μΈμ§€ ν™•μΈ
        existing = cursor.execute('''
            SELECT id FROM chat_participants
            WHERE room_id = ? AND user_id = ?
        ''', (room_id, user_id)).fetchone()
        
        if existing:
            return jsonify({'message': 'μ΄λ―Έ μ°Έκ°€ μ¤‘μΈ μ±„ν…λ°©μ…λ‹λ‹¤'})
        
        # μ°Έκ°€μ μ¶”κ°€
        cursor.execute('''
            INSERT INTO chat_participants (room_id, user_id)
            VALUES (?, ?)
        ''', (room_id, user_id))
        
        conn.commit()
        
        return jsonify({'success': True, 'message': 'μ±„ν…λ°©μ— μ°Έκ°€ν–μµλ‹λ‹¤'})
        
    except Exception as e:
        conn.rollback()
        return jsonify({'error': f'μ±„ν…λ°© μ°Έκ°€ μ‹¤ν¨: {str(e)}'}), 500
        
    finally:
        conn.close()

from flask import Flask, render_template, jsonify, request
from flask_cors import CORS
from flask_socketio import SocketIO, emit
import sqlite3
import json
from datetime import datetime, timedelta
import os
import threading
import time

app = Flask(__name__, 
            static_folder='../frontend/static',
            template_folder='../frontend/templates')
CORS(app)
socketio = SocketIO(app, cors_allowed_origins="*")

# μ„¤μ • νμΌ λ΅λ“
with open('../config.json', 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f:
    config = json.load(f)

def get_db_connection():
    """λ°μ΄ν„°λ² μ΄μ¤ μ—°κ²°"""
    db_path = os.path.join('..', config['database']['path'])
    conn = sqlite3.connect(db_path)
    conn.row_factory = sqlite3.Row
    return conn

@app.route('/')
def index():
    """λ©”μΈ λ€μ‹λ³΄λ“ νμ΄μ§€"""
    return render_template('dashboard.html')

@app.route('/api/attendance/current')
def get_current_attendance():
    """ν„μ¬ μ¶μ„ μ¤‘μΈ ν•™μƒ λ©λ΅"""
    conn = get_db_connection()
    cursor = conn.cursor()
    
    # μ¤λ μ¶μ„ν• ν•™μƒ μ¤‘ attending μƒνƒμΈ ν•™μƒλ“¤
    today = datetime.now().strftime('%Y-%m-%d')
    students = cursor.execute('''
        SELECT 
            student_id,
            student_name,
            check_in_time,
            expected_end_time,
            class_duration_minutes,
            status,
            CASE 
                WHEN datetime(expected_end_time) <= datetime('now', '+10 minutes') THEN 'ending_soon'
                WHEN datetime(expected_end_time) <= datetime('now') THEN 'overtime'
                ELSE 'normal'
            END as alert_status
        FROM attendance 
        WHERE DATE(check_in_time) = DATE('now', 'localtime')
        AND status = 'attending'
        ORDER BY check_in_time DESC
    ''').fetchall()
    
    conn.close()
    
    result = []
    for student in students:
        check_in = datetime.fromisoformat(student['check_in_time'])
        expected_end = datetime.fromisoformat(student['expected_end_time'])
        now = datetime.now()
        
        # λ‚¨μ€ μ‹κ°„ κ³„μ‚°
        remaining_minutes = int((expected_end - now).total_seconds() / 60)
        
        result.append({
            'student_id': student['student_id'],
            'student_name': student['student_name'],
            'check_in_time': check_in.strftime('%H:%M'),
            'expected_end_time': expected_end.strftime('%H:%M'),
            'duration_minutes': student['class_duration_minutes'],
            'remaining_minutes': remaining_minutes,
            'alert_status': student['alert_status'],
            'status': student['status']
        })
    
    return jsonify(result)

@app.route('/api/attendance/history')
def get_attendance_history():
    """μ¶μ„ νμ¤ν† λ¦¬ μ΅°ν"""
    date = request.args.get('date', datetime.now().strftime('%Y-%m-%d'))
    
    conn = get_db_connection()
    cursor = conn.cursor()
    
    students = cursor.execute('''
        SELECT * FROM attendance 
        WHERE DATE(check_in_time) = ?
        ORDER BY check_in_time DESC
    ''', (date,)).fetchall()
    
    conn.close()
    
    result = []
    for student in students:
        result.append({
            'student_id': student['student_id'],
            'student_name': student['student_name'],
            'check_in_time': student['check_in_time'],
            'expected_end_time': student['expected_end_time'],
            'actual_end_time': student['actual_end_time'],
            'status': student['status']
        })
    
    return jsonify(result)

@app.route('/api/notifications')
def get_notifications():
    """μµκ·Ό μ•λ¦Ό λ©λ΅"""
    conn = get_db_connection()
    cursor = conn.cursor()
    
    notifications = cursor.execute('''
        SELECT * FROM notifications 
        WHERE DATE(sent_at) = DATE('now', 'localtime')
        ORDER BY sent_at DESC
        LIMIT 20
    ''').fetchall()
    
    conn.close()
    
    result = []
    for notif in notifications:
        result.append({
            'student_name': notif['student_name'],
            'type': notif['notification_type'],
            'message': notif['message'],
            'sent_at': notif['sent_at']
        })
    
    return jsonify(result)

@app.route('/api/student/<student_id>/end', methods=['POST'])
def end_student_session(student_id):
    """ν•™μƒ μμ—… μΆ…λ£ μ²λ¦¬"""
    conn = get_db_connection()
    cursor = conn.cursor()
    
    cursor.execute('''
        UPDATE attendance 
        SET status = 'completed', 
            actual_end_time = datetime('now', 'localtime')
        WHERE student_id = ? 
        AND DATE(check_in_time) = DATE('now', 'localtime')
        AND status = 'attending'
    ''', (student_id,))
    
    conn.commit()
    conn.close()
    
    # μ‹¤μ‹κ°„ μ—…λ°μ΄νΈ μ•λ¦Ό
    socketio.emit('student_ended', {'student_id': student_id})
    
    return jsonify({'success': True})

@app.route('/api/student/<student_id>/extend', methods=['POST'])
def extend_student_session(student_id):
    """ν•™μƒ μμ—… μ‹κ°„ μ—°μ¥"""
    minutes = request.json.get('minutes', 30)
    
    conn = get_db_connection()
    cursor = conn.cursor()
    
    cursor.execute('''
        UPDATE attendance 
        SET expected_end_time = datetime(expected_end_time, '+' || ? || ' minutes'),
            class_duration_minutes = class_duration_minutes + ?
        WHERE student_id = ? 
        AND DATE(check_in_time) = DATE('now', 'localtime')
        AND status = 'attending'
    ''', (minutes, minutes, student_id))
    
    conn.commit()
    conn.close()
    
    # μ‹¤μ‹κ°„ μ—…λ°μ΄νΈ μ•λ¦Ό
    socketio.emit('student_extended', {'student_id': student_id, 'minutes': minutes})
    
    return jsonify({'success': True})

@app.route('/api/stats/today')
def get_today_stats():
    """μ¤λμ ν†µκ³„"""
    conn = get_db_connection()
    cursor = conn.cursor()
    
    # μ „μ²΄ μ¶μ„ ν•™μƒ μ
    total_students = cursor.execute('''
        SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT student_id) as count
        FROM attendance 
        WHERE DATE(check_in_time) = DATE('now', 'localtime')
    ''').fetchone()['count']
    
    # ν„μ¬ μμ—… μ¤‘μΈ ν•™μƒ μ
    current_students = cursor.execute('''
        SELECT COUNT(*) as count
        FROM attendance 
        WHERE DATE(check_in_time) = DATE('now', 'localtime')
        AND status = 'attending'
    ''').fetchone()['count']
    
    # μΆ…λ£ μ„λ°• ν•™μƒ μ
    ending_soon = cursor.execute('''
        SELECT COUNT(*) as count
        FROM attendance 
        WHERE DATE(check_in_time) = DATE('now', 'localtime')
        AND status = 'attending'
        AND datetime(expected_end_time) <= datetime('now', '+10 minutes')
    ''').fetchone()['count']
    
    conn.close()
    
    return jsonify({
        'total_students': total_students,
        'current_students': current_students,
        'ending_soon': ending_soon,
        'completed_students': total_students - current_students
    })

def background_refresh():
    """λ°±κ·ΈλΌμ΄λ“μ—μ„ μ£ΌκΈ°μ μΌλ΅ λ°μ΄ν„° μ—…λ°μ΄νΈ μ•λ¦Ό"""
    while True:
        time.sleep(config['web_dashboard']['auto_refresh_seconds'])
        socketio.emit('refresh_data', {'timestamp': datetime.now().isoformat()})

# μ¨λΌμΈ μ‚¬μ©μ κ΄€λ¦¬
online_users = {}

# WebSocket μ΄λ²¤νΈ ν•Έλ“¤λ¬
@socketio.on('connect')
def handle_connect():
    emit('connected', {'data': 'Connected to monitoring system'})

@socketio.on('disconnect')
def handle_disconnect():
    print('Client disconnected')
    # μ¨λΌμΈ μƒνƒ μ—…λ°μ΄νΈ
    if request.sid in online_users:
        user_id = online_users[request.sid]
        update_user_offline_status(user_id)
        del online_users[request.sid]

# === μ±„ν… κ΄€λ ¨ WebSocket μ΄λ²¤νΈ ===

@socketio.on('join_chat')
def handle_join_chat(data):
    """μ±„ν…λ°© μ…μ¥"""
    try:
        user_id = data.get('user_id')
        room_id = data.get('room_id')
        
        if not user_id or not room_id:
            emit('error', {'message': 'user_idμ™€ room_idκ°€ ν•„μ”ν•©λ‹λ‹¤'})
            return
            
        # μ‚¬μ©μ μ¨λΌμΈ μƒνƒ μ—…λ°μ΄νΈ
        online_users[request.sid] = user_id
        update_user_online_status(user_id, request.sid, room_id)
        
        # μ±„ν…λ°© μ…μ¥ μ²λ¦¬
        join_chat_room(user_id, room_id)
        
        # μµκ·Ό λ©”μ‹μ§€ κ°€μ Έμ¤κΈ°
        messages = get_recent_messages(room_id, limit=50)
        
        emit('joined_chat', {
            'room_id': room_id,
            'messages': messages,
            'user_id': user_id
        })
        
        # λ‹¤λ¥Έ μ‚¬μ©μλ“¤μ—κ² μ…μ¥ μ•λ¦Ό
        socketio.emit('user_joined', {
            'room_id': room_id,
            'user_id': user_id,
            'timestamp': datetime.now().isoformat()
        }, room=f"room_{room_id}")
        
    except Exception as e:
        emit('error', {'message': f'μ±„ν…λ°© μ…μ¥ μ‹¤ν¨: {str(e)}'})

@socketio.on('send_message')
def handle_send_message(data):
    """λ©”μ‹μ§€ μ „μ†΅"""
    try:
        user_id = data.get('user_id')
        room_id = data.get('room_id')
        content = data.get('content')
        message_type = data.get('message_type', 'text')
        
        if not all([user_id, room_id, content]):
            emit('error', {'message': 'ν•„μ λ°μ΄ν„°κ°€ λ„λ½λμ—μµλ‹λ‹¤'})
            return
            
        # λ©”μ‹μ§€ λ°μ΄ν„°λ² μ΄μ¤μ— μ €μ¥
        message = save_message(user_id, room_id, content, message_type)
        
        if message:
            # μ±„ν…λ°©μ λ¨λ“  μ‚¬μ©μμ—κ² λ©”μ‹μ§€ μ „μ†΅
            socketio.emit('new_message', {
                'id': message['id'],
                'room_id': room_id,
                'sender_id': user_id,
                'sender_name': message['sender_name'],
                'content': content,
                'message_type': message_type,
                'created_at': message['created_at']
            }, room=f"room_{room_id}")
            
            emit('message_sent', {'success': True, 'message_id': message['id']})
        else:
            emit('error', {'message': 'λ©”μ‹μ§€ μ €μ¥ μ‹¤ν¨'})
            
    except Exception as e:
        emit('error', {'message': f'λ©”μ‹μ§€ μ „μ†΅ μ‹¤ν¨: {str(e)}'})

@socketio.on('leave_chat')
def handle_leave_chat(data):
    """μ±„ν…λ°© ν‡΄μ¥"""
    try:
        user_id = data.get('user_id')
        room_id = data.get('room_id')
        
        if user_id and room_id:
            # λ‹¤λ¥Έ μ‚¬μ©μλ“¤μ—κ² ν‡΄μ¥ μ•λ¦Ό
            socketio.emit('user_left', {
                'room_id': room_id,
                'user_id': user_id,
                'timestamp': datetime.now().isoformat()
            }, room=f"room_{room_id}")
            
            # μ‚¬μ©μ μƒνƒ μ—…λ°μ΄νΈ
            update_user_online_status(user_id, request.sid, None)
            
        emit('left_chat', {'room_id': room_id})
        
    except Exception as e:
        emit('error', {'message': f'μ±„ν…λ°© ν‡΄μ¥ μ‹¤ν¨: {str(e)}'})

@socketio.on('typing')
def handle_typing(data):
    """νƒ€μ΄ν•‘ μƒνƒ μ „μ†΅"""
    try:
        user_id = data.get('user_id')
        room_id = data.get('room_id')
        is_typing = data.get('is_typing', False)
        
        if user_id and room_id:
            socketio.emit('user_typing', {
                'room_id': room_id,
                'user_id': user_id,
                'is_typing': is_typing,
                'timestamp': datetime.now().isoformat()
            }, room=f"room_{room_id}")
            
    except Exception as e:
        pass  # νƒ€μ΄ν•‘ μƒνƒλ” μ—λ¬κ°€ λ°μƒν•΄λ„ λ¬΄μ‹

# === μ±„ν… κ΄€λ ¨ ν—¬νΌ ν•¨μ ===

def update_user_online_status(user_id, socket_id, room_id):
    """μ‚¬μ©μ μ¨λΌμΈ μƒνƒ μ—…λ°μ΄νΈ"""
    conn = get_db_connection()
    cursor = conn.cursor()
    
    cursor.execute('''
        INSERT OR REPLACE INTO user_online_status 
        (user_id, is_online, last_seen, socket_id, current_room_id)
        VALUES (?, ?, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, ?, ?)
    ''', (user_id, 1, socket_id, room_id))
    
    conn.commit()
    conn.close()

def update_user_offline_status(user_id):
    """μ‚¬μ©μ μ¤ν”„λΌμΈ μƒνƒ μ—…λ°μ΄νΈ"""
    conn = get_db_connection()
    cursor = conn.cursor()
    
    cursor.execute('''
        UPDATE user_online_status 
        SET is_online = 0, last_seen = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, socket_id = NULL, current_room_id = NULL
        WHERE user_id = ?
    ''', (user_id,))
    
    conn.commit()
    conn.close()

def join_chat_room(user_id, room_id):
    """μ±„ν…λ°© μ°Έκ°€μλ΅ μ¶”κ°€ (μ΄λ―Έ μμΌλ©΄ λ¬΄μ‹)"""
    conn = get_db_connection()
    cursor = conn.cursor()
    
    cursor.execute('''
        INSERT OR IGNORE INTO chat_participants (room_id, user_id)
        VALUES (?, ?)
    ''', (room_id, user_id))
    
    conn.commit()
    conn.close()

def get_recent_messages(room_id, limit=50):
    """μ±„ν…λ°©μ μµκ·Ό λ©”μ‹μ§€ κ°€μ Έμ¤κΈ°"""
    conn = get_db_connection()
    cursor = conn.cursor()
    
    messages = cursor.execute('''
        SELECT 
            m.id,
            m.sender_id,
            u.display_name as sender_name,
            m.content,
            m.message_type,
            m.created_at
        FROM chat_messages m
        JOIN users u ON m.sender_id = u.id
        WHERE m.room_id = ? AND m.is_deleted = 0
        ORDER BY m.created_at DESC
        LIMIT ?
    ''', (room_id, limit)).fetchall()
    
    conn.close()
    
    # μµμ‹  μμΌλ΅ μ •λ ¬
    return [dict(msg) for msg in reversed(messages)]

def save_message(user_id, room_id, content, message_type='text'):
    """λ©”μ‹μ§€λ¥Ό λ°μ΄ν„°λ² μ΄μ¤μ— μ €μ¥"""
    conn = get_db_connection()
    cursor = conn.cursor()
    
    # λ©”μ‹μ§€ μ €μ¥
    cursor.execute('''
        INSERT INTO chat_messages (room_id, sender_id, content, message_type)
        VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?)
    ''', (room_id, user_id, content, message_type))
    
    message_id = cursor.lastrowid
    
    # λ°μ†΅μ μ •λ³΄ κ°€μ Έμ¤κΈ°
    sender = cursor.execute('''
        SELECT display_name FROM users WHERE id = ?
    ''', (user_id,)).fetchone()
    
    conn.commit()
    conn.close()
    
    return {
        'id': message_id,
        'sender_name': sender['display_name'] if sender else 'Unknown',
        'created_at': datetime.now().isoformat()
    }

if __name__ == '__main__':
    # λ°±κ·ΈλΌμ΄λ“ λ¦¬ν”„λ μ‹ μ¤λ λ“ μ‹μ‘
    refresh_thread = threading.Thread(target=background_refresh, daemon=True)
    refresh_thread.start()
    
    # μ„λ²„ μ‹¤ν–‰
    port = config['web_dashboard']['port']
    print(f"λ€μ‹λ³΄λ“ μ„λ²„ μ‹μ‘: http://localhost:{port}")
    socketio.run(app, debug=True, port=port, host='0.0.0.0')

The code suggests a security logout mechanism that redirects to a login page ('/center_login_lite.asp'), but there's insufficient information to confirm if this is specifically an attendance management page or to analyze student attendance details. More context or additional page source code would be needed to make a definitive assessment.

The key elements I can observe are:
- Language: Korean
- Action: Automatic logout alert
- Redirect: To a login page

import json
import time
import sqlite3
import requests
from datetime import datetime, timedelta
from bs4 import BeautifulSoup
import logging
from typing import Dict, List, Optional
import os
import re
from urllib.parse import unquote

class EduOKMonitor:
    def __init__(self, config_path='../config.json'):
        """μ—λ“€OK λ¨λ‹ν„°λ§ μ‹μ¤ν… μ΄κΈ°ν™”"""
        print("attok λ¨λ‹ν„°λ§ μ‹μ¤ν…μ„ μ‹μ‘ν•©λ‹λ‹¤!")
        print("=" * 50)
        
        with open(config_path, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f:
            self.config = json.load(f)
        
        self.session = requests.Session()
        self.current_students = {}
        self.base_url = "https://www.attok.co.kr:301"
        self.cookies_valid = False
        
        # λ΅κΉ… μ„¤μ •
        logging.basicConfig(
            level=logging.INFO,
            format='%(asctime)s - %(levelname)s - %(message)s',
            handlers=[
                logging.FileHandler('../logs/monitor.log', encoding='utf-8'),
                logging.StreamHandler()
            ]
        )
        self.logger = logging.getLogger(__name__)
        
        # HTTP μ„Έμ… μ„¤μ •
        self.session.headers.update({
            'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/139.0.0.0 Safari/537.36',
            'Accept': 'text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,image/webp,*/*;q=0.8',
            'Accept-Language': 'ko-KR,ko;q=0.8,en-US;q=0.5,en;q=0.3',
            'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate, br',
            'Connection': 'keep-alive',
            'Referer': 'https://www.attok.co.kr:301/'
        })
        
        # λ°μ΄ν„°λ² μ΄μ¤ μ΄κΈ°ν™”
        self.init_database()
        
        # μ΄κΈ° μΏ ν‚¤ μ„¤μ •
        if not self.update_cookies_interactive():
            raise Exception("λ΅κ·ΈμΈ μ‹¤ν¨: μ ν¨ν• μΏ ν‚¤λ¥Ό μ–»μ„ μ μ—†μµλ‹λ‹¤.")
    
    def init_database(self):
        """SQLite λ°μ΄ν„°λ² μ΄μ¤ μ΄κΈ°ν™”"""
        db_path = os.path.join('..', self.config['database']['path'])
        os.makedirs(os.path.dirname(db_path), exist_ok=True)
        
        self.conn = sqlite3.connect(db_path)
        cursor = self.conn.cursor()
        
        # μ¶μ„ ν…μ΄λΈ” μƒμ„±
        cursor.execute('''
            CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS attendance (
                id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
                student_id TEXT NOT NULL,
                student_name TEXT NOT NULL,
                check_in_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
                expected_end_time TIMESTAMP,
                actual_end_time TIMESTAMP,
                class_duration_minutes INTEGER,
                status TEXT DEFAULT 'attending',
                created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
            )
        ''')
        
        # μ•λ¦Ό λ΅κ·Έ ν…μ΄λΈ”
        cursor.execute('''
            CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS notifications (
                id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
                student_id TEXT NOT NULL,
                student_name TEXT NOT NULL,
                notification_type TEXT NOT NULL,
                message TEXT,
                sent_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
            )
        ''')
        
        self.conn.commit()
        self.logger.info("λ°μ΄ν„°λ² μ΄μ¤ μ΄κΈ°ν™” μ™„λ£")
    
    def update_cookies_interactive(self, max_retries=None):
        """λ€ν™”ν•μΌλ΅ μΏ ν‚¤ μ •λ³΄ μ…λ ¥λ°›κΈ° (μ¬μ‹λ„ κΈ°λ¥ ν¬ν•¨)"""
        if max_retries is None:
            max_retries = self.config.get('monitoring', {}).get('login_max_retries', 3)
        
        retry_count = 0
        
        while retry_count < max_retries:

#!/usr/bin/env python3
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
"""
μΏ ν‚¤λ¥Ό μ‚¬μ©ν• attok.co.kr μ¶μ„ λ°μ΄ν„° μμ§‘ ν…μ¤νΈ
"""

import requests
from bs4 import BeautifulSoup
import json
import re
from datetime import datetime

def test_attendance_fetch():
    """μΏ ν‚¤λ¥Ό μ‚¬μ©ν•΄μ„ μ¶μ„ νμ΄μ§€ λ°μ΄ν„° κ°€μ Έμ¤κΈ°"""
    
    # μΏ ν‚¤ μ„¤μ •
    cookies = {
        'ASPSESSIONIDCSQRRTCB': 'BDMBGCOCHKDJMDBLHEIAFNDM',
        'cookies_attendance_orderDirection': 'student_name%7C%5E%7Casc',
        'cookies_userid': 'roncorobot',
        'cookies_userpass': '%3D%3DQI0czM282Yu9mU',
        'Slim_UID': 'roncorobot'
    }
    
    # HTTP ν—¤λ” μ„¤μ •
    headers = {
        'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/139.0.0.0 Safari/537.36',
        'Accept': 'text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,image/webp,*/*;q=0.8',
        'Accept-Language': 'ko-KR,ko;q=0.8,en-US;q=0.5,en;q=0.3',
        'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate, br',
        'Connection': 'keep-alive',
        'Referer': 'https://attok.co.kr/'
    }
    
    session = requests.Session()
    session.cookies.update(cookies)
    session.headers.update(headers)
    
    try:
        print("=== attok.co.kr μ¶μ„ λ°μ΄ν„° μμ§‘ ν…μ¤νΈ ===")
        
        # μ¶μ„ νμ΄μ§€ μ”μ²­
        url = 'https://attok.co.kr/content/attendance/attendance.asp'
        print(f"μ”μ²­ URL: {url}")
        
        response = session.get(url, timeout=10)
        
        print(f"μ‘λ‹µ μƒνƒμ½”λ“: {response.status_code}")
        print(f"μ‘λ‹µ ν—¤λ”: Content-Type = {response.headers.get('Content-Type')}")
        print(f"μ‘λ‹µ ν¬κΈ°: {len(response.content)} bytes")
        
        if response.status_code == 200:

#!/usr/bin/env python3
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
"""
HTMLμ—μ„ λ“±λ΅λ ν•™μƒ μ •λ³΄ μ¶”μ¶ μ¤ν¬λ¦½νΈ
"""

import re
from bs4 import BeautifulSoup

def extract_student_info():
    """HTMLμ—μ„ ν•™μƒ μ •λ³΄ μ¶”μ¶"""
    
    try:
        print("=== λ“±λ΅λ ν•™μƒ μ •λ³΄ μ¶”μ¶ ===")
        
        # HTML νμΌ μ½κΈ°
        with open('attendance_page_debug.html', 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f:
            html_content = f.read()
        
        print(f"HTML νμΌ ν¬κΈ°: {len(html_content)} bytes")
        
        # BeautifulSoupλ΅ νμ‹±
        soup = BeautifulSoup(html_content, 'html.parser')
        
        students_found = set()  # μ¤‘λ³µ μ κ±°μ©
        
        # λ°©λ²• 1: JavaScript λ³€μμ—μ„ ν•™μƒ μ •λ³΄ μ°ΎκΈ°
        scripts = soup.find_all('script')
        for script in scripts:
            if script.string:
                script_content = script.string
                
                # STUDENT_NAME ν¨ν„΄ μ°ΎκΈ°
                if 'STUDENT_NAME' in script_content:
                    print("\n--- JavaScriptμ—μ„ STUDENT_NAME κ΄€λ ¨ μ½”λ“ λ°κ²¬ ---")
                    
                    # ν•κΈ€ μ΄λ¦„ ν¨ν„΄ μ°ΎκΈ° (2-10μ)
                    korean_names = re.findall(r'[κ°€-ν£]{2,10}', script_content)
                    for name in korean_names:
                        if len(name) >= 2 and len(name) <= 10:
                            students_found.add(name)
        
        # λ°©λ²• 2: stdinfo μ†μ„±μ—μ„ ν•™μƒ μ •λ³΄ μ°ΎκΈ°  
        print("\n--- HTML μ†μ„±μ—μ„ stdinfo ν¨ν„΄ μ°ΎκΈ° ---")
        stdinfo_pattern = re.findall(r'stdinfo_([^"\s\']+)', html_content)
        print(f"stdinfo ν¨ν„΄ {len(stdinfo_pattern)}κ° λ°κ²¬")
        for pattern in stdinfo_pattern[:10]:  # μ²μ 10κ°λ§ μ¶λ ¥
            print(f"  - stdinfo_{pattern}")
        
        # λ°©λ²• 3: STDINFO-DATA μ†μ„± μ°ΎκΈ°
        print("\n--- STDINFO-DATA μ†μ„± ν¨ν„΄ μ°ΎκΈ° ---")
        data_attrs = re.findall(r'STDINFO-DATA-([A-Z_]+)', html_content)
        unique_attrs = list(set(data_attrs))

#!/usr/bin/env python3
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
"""
κ°„λ‹¨ν• ν•™μƒ μ •λ³΄ ν™•μΈ μ¤ν¬λ¦½νΈ
"""

import re

def check_students():
    try:
        with open('attendance_page_debug.html', 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f:
            content = f.read()
        
        print("[INFO] HTML file loaded successfully")
        
        # ν•κΈ€ μ΄λ¦„ ν¨ν„΄ μ°ΎκΈ° (2-4κΈ€μ)
        korean_names = re.findall(r'[κ°€-ν£]{2,4}', content)
        
        # μ¤‘λ³µ μ κ±° λ° ν•„ν„°λ§
        unique_names = set()
        for name in korean_names:
            # μΌλ°μ μ΄μ§€ μ•μ€ λ‹¨μ–΄λ“¤ μ μ™Έ
            if not any(word in name for word in [
                'κ΄€λ¦¬', 'μ„ νƒ', 'μ „μ²΄', 'μ—†μ', 'κΈ°νƒ€', 'λ“±λ΅', 'μ‚­μ ', 'μμ •', 
                'ν™•μΈ', 'μ·¨μ†', 'μ €μ¥', 'μ΅°ν', 'κ²€μƒ‰', 'μ¶λ ¥', 'μΈμ‡„', 'λ³µμ‚¬',
                'ν•™μ›', 'ν•™μƒ', 'μ„ μƒ', 'λ¶€λ¨', 'λ³΄νΈ', 'μ—°λ½', 'μ „ν™”', 'λ¬Έμ',
                'μ‹κ°„', 'λ¶„μ„', 'ν†µκ³„', 'ν„ν™©', 'μƒνƒ', 'μ •λ³΄', 'λ°μ΄ν„°'
            ]):
                if len(name) >= 2 and len(name) <= 4:
                    unique_names.add(name)
        
        # κ°€λ¥μ„±μ΄ λ†’μ€ μ΄λ¦„λ“¤λ§ μ„ λ³„ (μ„±μ”¨ + μ΄λ¦„ ν¨ν„΄)
        common_surnames = ['κΉ€', 'μ΄', 'λ°•', 'μµ', 'μ •', 'κ°•', 'μ΅°', 'μ¤', 'μ¥', 'μ„', 'μ¤', 'ν•', 'μ‹ ', 'μ„', 'κ¶', 'ν™©', 'μ•', 'μ†΅', 'λ¥', 'μ „', 'ν™', 'κ³ ', 'λ¬Έ', 'μ–‘', 'μ†', 'λ°°', 'μ΅°', 'λ°±', 'ν—', 'μ ', 'λ‚¨', 'μ‹¬', 'λ…Έ', 'μ •', 'ν•', 'κ³½', 'μ„±', 'μ°¨', 'μ£Ό', 'μ°', 'κµ¬', 'μ‹ ', 'μ›', 'λ―Ό', 'μ§„', 'μ—„', 'μ±„', 'μ›', 'μ²', 'κ³µ', 'κ°•', 'ν„', 'ν•¨', 'λ³€', 'μ—Ό', 'μ–‘', 'λ³€', 'μ—¬', 'μ¶”', 'λ…Έ', 'λ„', 'μ†', 'μ‹ ', 'μ„', 'μ„ ', 'μ„¤', 'λ§', 'κΈΈ', 'μ—°', 'μ„', 'ν‘', 'λ…', 'κΈ°', 'λ°', 'μ™•', 'κΈ', 'μ¥', 'μ΅', 'μΈ', 'λ§Ή', 'μ ', 'λ¨', 'μ¥', 'λ‚¨', 'νƒ', 'κµ­', 'μ—¬', 'μ§„', 'μ–΄', 'μ€', 'νΈ', 'κµ¬', 'μ©']
        
        probable_names = []
        for name in unique_names:
            if name[0] in common_surnames:
                probable_names.append(name)
        
        print(f"[RESULT] Found {len(probable_names)} probable student names:")
        for name in sorted(probable_names):
            print(f"  - {name}")
            
        if not probable_names:
            print("[WARNING] No student names found in current session")
            print("This could mean:")
            print("  1. No students are currently registered in the system")  
            print("  2. Students are not attending at this time")
            print("  3. Student data is stored in a different format")
        
        # μ‹¤μ  μ¶μ„ μƒνƒ ν™•μΈλ„ ν•΄λ³΄μ
        if 'ATTENDANCE_STATE' in content:
            print(f"\n[INFO] ATTENDANCE_STATE field found in HTML")
            attendance_patterns = re.findall(r'ATTENDANCE_STATE["\s]*[=:]["\s]*([^"\'>\s]+)', content)
            if attendance_patterns:
                print(f"[INFO] Attendance patterns: {set(attendance_patterns)}")
            else:
                print("[INFO] No attendance state values found")
        
    except Exception as e:
        print(f"[ERROR] {e}")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    check_students()

        unique_names = set()
        for name in korean_names:
            # μΌλ°μ μ΄μ§€ μ•μ€ λ‹¨μ–΄λ“¤ μ μ™Έ
            if not any(word in name for word in [
                'κ΄€λ¦¬', 'μ„ νƒ', 'μ „μ²΄', 'μ—†μ', 'κΈ°νƒ€', 'λ“±λ΅', 'μ‚­μ ', 'μμ •',

            ]):

        # κ°€λ¥μ„±μ΄ λ†’μ€ μ΄λ¦„λ“¤λ§ μ„ λ³„ (μ„±μ”¨ + μ΄λ¦„ ν¨ν„΄)
        common_surnames = ['κΉ€', 'μ΄', 'λ°•', 'μµ', 'μ •', 'κ°•', 'μ΅°', 'μ¤', 'μ¥', 'μ„', 'μ¤', 'ν•', 'μ‹ ', 'μ„', 'κ¶', 'ν™©', 'μ•', 'μ†΅', 'λ¥', 'μ „', 'ν™', 'κ³ ', 'λ¬Έ', 'μ–‘', 'μ†', 'λ°°', 'μ΅°', 'λ°±', 'ν—', 'μ ', 'λ‚¨', 'μ‹¬', 'λ…Έ', 'μ •', 'ν•', 'κ³½', 'μ„±', 'μ°¨', 'μ£Ό', 'μ°', 'κµ¬', 'μ‹ ', 'μ›', 'λ―Ό', 'μ§„', 'μ—„', 'μ±„', 'μ›', 'μ²', 'κ³µ', 'κ°•', 'ν„', 'ν•¨', 'λ³€', 'μ—Ό', 'μ–‘', 'λ³€', 'μ—¬', 'μ¶”', 'λ…Έ', 'λ„', 'μ†', 'μ‹ ', 'μ„', 'μ„ ', 'μ„¤', 'λ§', 'κΈΈ', 'μ—°', 'μ„', 'ν‘', 'λ…', 'κΈ°', 'λ°', 'μ™•', 'κΈ', 'μ¥', 'μ΅', 'μΈ', 'λ§Ή', 'μ ', 'λ¨', 'μ¥', 'λ‚¨', 'νƒ', 'κµ­', 'μ—¬', 'μ§„', 'μ–΄', 'μ€', 'νΈ', 'κµ¬', 'μ©']

#!/usr/bin/env python3
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
"""
ν•™μƒ μ΄λ¦„ μ •ν™•ν μ¶”μ¶ν•λ” μ¤ν¬λ¦½νΈ
"""

import re
import json

def get_clean_student_names():
    try:
        # UTF-8λ΅ νμΌ μ½κΈ°
        with open('attendance_page_debug.html', 'r', encoding='utf-8', errors='ignore') as f:
            content = f.read()
        
        print("=== ν•™μƒ μ΄λ¦„ μ¶”μ¶ κ²°κ³Ό ===")
        
        # ν•κΈ€ μ΄λ¦„λ§ μ¶”μ¶ (2-4κΈ€μ)
        korean_names = re.findall(r'[κ°€-ν£]{2,4}', content)
        
        # μ‹¤μ  ν•™μƒ μ΄λ¦„ κ°™μ€ κ²ƒλ“¤λ§ ν•„ν„°λ§
        valid_names = set()
        
        # μ μ™Έν•  λ‹¨μ–΄λ“¤ (μ‹μ¤ν… κ΄€λ ¨ μ©μ–΄)
        exclude_words = [
            'κ΄€λ¦¬', 'μ„ νƒ', 'μ „μ²΄', 'μ—†μ', 'κΈ°νƒ€', 'λ“±λ΅', 'μ‚­μ ', 'μμ •', 'ν™•μΈ', 'μ·¨μ†', 
            'μ €μ¥', 'μ΅°ν', 'κ²€μƒ‰', 'μ¶λ ¥', 'μΈμ‡„', 'λ³µμ‚¬', 'ν•™μ›', 'ν•™μƒ', 'μ„ μƒ', 'λ¶€λ¨',
            'λ³΄νΈ', 'μ—°λ½', 'μ „ν™”', 'λ¬Έμ', 'μ‹κ°„', 'λ¶„μ„', 'ν†µκ³„', 'ν„ν™©', 'μƒνƒ', 'μ •λ³΄', 
            'λ°μ΄ν„°', 'μ‹μ¤ν…', 'ν™”λ©΄', 'νμ΄μ§€', 'λ©”λ‰΄', 'λ²„νΌ', 'ν΄λ¦­', 'λ§μ°μ¤', 'ν‚¤λ³΄λ“',
            'μ…λ ¥', 'μ¶λ ¥', 'νμΌ', 'ν΄λ”', 'κ²½λ΅', 'μ„μΉ', 'ν¬κΈ°', 'μƒ‰μƒ', 'ν°νΈ', 'μ¤νƒ€μΌ',
            'λ μ΄μ•„μ›ƒ', 'λ””μμΈ', 'μ„¤μ •', 'ν™κ²½', 'μµμ…', 'κΈ°λ¥', 'λ„κµ¬', 'μ•„μ΄μ½', 'μ΄λ―Έμ§€',
            'λΉ„λ””μ¤', 'μ¤λ””μ¤', 'ν…μ¤νΈ', 'λ¬Έμ„', 'ν‘κ²©', 'μ°¨νΈ', 'κ·Έλν”„', 'λ©λ΅', 'ν•­λ©',
            'λ‚΄μ©', 'μ λ©', 'μ„¤λ…', 'μ•λ‚΄', 'λ„μ›€', 'μ§€μ›', 'μ„λΉ„μ¤', 'κ³ κ°', 'μ‚¬μ©μ',
            'νμ›', 'λ΅κ·ΈμΈ', 'λ΅κ·Έμ•„μ›ƒ', 'νμ›κ°€μ…', 'λΉ„λ°€λ²νΈ', 'μ•„μ΄λ””', 'κ³„μ •', 'ν”„λ΅ν•„',
            'κ°μΈμ •λ³΄', 'λ³΄μ•', 'μΈμ¦', 'κ¶ν•', 'μ ‘κ·Ό', 'ν—μ©', 'μ ν•', 'κΈμ§€', 'μ¤λ¥',
            'κ²½κ³ ', 'μ•λ¦Ό', 'λ©”μ‹μ§€', 'κ³µμ§€', 'μ΄λ²¤νΈ', 'μ΄μ©μ•½κ΄€', 'κ°μΈμ •λ³΄μ²λ¦¬λ°©μΉ¨'
        ]
        
        for name in korean_names:
            # κΈΈμ΄ μ²΄ν¬ (2-4κΈ€μ)
            if len(name) < 2 or len(name) > 4:
                continue
                
            # μ μ™Έ λ‹¨μ–΄ μ²΄ν¬
            if any(word in name for word in exclude_words):
                continue
                
            # μλ―Έμλ” μ΄λ¦„ ν¨ν„΄ (μ„±μ”¨λ΅ μ‹μ‘ν•λ” κ²ƒλ“¤)
            common_surnames = [
                'κΉ€', 'μ΄', 'λ°•', 'μµ', 'μ •', 'κ°•', 'μ΅°', 'μ¤', 'μ¥', 'μ„', 'μ¤', 'ν•', 'μ‹ ', 'μ„',
                'κ¶', 'ν™©', 'μ•', 'μ†΅', 'λ¥', 'μ „', 'ν™', 'κ³ ', 'λ¬Έ', 'μ–‘', 'μ†', 'λ°°', 'λ°±', 'ν—',
                'μ ', 'λ‚¨', 'μ‹¬', 'λ…Έ', 'ν•', 'κ³½', 'μ„±', 'μ°¨', 'μ£Ό', 'μ°', 'κµ¬', 'μ›', 'λ―Ό', 'μ§„',
                'μ—„', 'μ±„', 'μ²', 'κ³µ', 'ν„', 'ν•¨', 'λ³€', 'μ—Ό', 'μ—¬', 'μ¶”', 'λ„', 'μ†', 'μ„', 'μ„ ',
                'μ„¤', 'λ§', 'κΈΈ', 'μ—°', 'μ„', 'ν‘', 'λ…', 'κΈ°', 'λ°', 'μ™•', 'κΈ', 'μ¥', 'μ΅', 'μΈ',
                'λ§Ή', 'μ ', 'λ¨', 'νƒ', 'κµ­', 'μ–΄', 'μ€', 'νΈ', 'μ©', 'ν”Ό', 'λ‹¬', 'μ‚¬', 'μΉ', 'κ²¬'
            ]
            
            # μ„±μ”¨λ΅ μ‹μ‘ν•λ” μ΄λ¦„λ§ μ„ νƒ
            if name[0] in common_surnames:
                valid_names.add(name)
        
        # κ²°κ³Ό μ¶λ ¥
        student_names = sorted(list(valid_names))
        
        print(f"μ΄ {len(student_names)}λ…μ ν•™μƒ μ΄λ¦„μ„ λ°κ²¬ν–μµλ‹λ‹¤:")
        print("")
        
        # μ„±μ”¨λ³„λ΅ κ·Έλ£Ήν•‘ν•΄μ„ λ³΄κΈ° μΆ‹κ² μ¶λ ¥
        by_surname = {}
        for name in student_names:
            surname = name[0]
            if surname not in by_surname:
                by_surname[surname] = []
            by_surname[surname].append(name)
        
        for surname in sorted(by_surname.keys()):
            names = by_surname[surname]
            print(f"{surname}μ”¨ μ„±: {', '.join(names)} ({len(names)}λ…)")
        
        print(f"\nμ „μ²΄ ν•™μƒ λ…λ‹¨:")
        for i, name in enumerate(student_names, 1):
            print(f"{i:3d}. {name}")
            
        # JSON νμΌλ΅ μ €μ¥
        with open('student_names.json', 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f:
            json.dump({
                'total_count': len(student_names),
                'names': student_names,
                'by_surname': by_surname
            }, f, ensure_ascii=False, indent=2)
        
        print(f"\nν•™μƒ λ…λ‹¨μ΄ 'student_names.json' νμΌλ΅ μ €μ¥λμ—μµλ‹λ‹¤.")
        
        return student_names
        
    except Exception as e:
        print(f"μ¤λ¥ λ°μƒ: {e}")
        return []

if __name__ == "__main__":
    get_clean_student_names()

#!/usr/bin/env python3
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
"""
λ“±λ΅λ λ¨λ“  ν•™μƒ μ΄λ¦„ μ°ΎκΈ°
"""

import re
import json
from bs4 import BeautifulSoup

def find_all_registered_students():
    try:
        with open('attendance_page_debug.html', 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f:
            content = f.read()
        
        print("=== λ“±λ΅λ λ¨λ“  ν•™μƒ μ΄λ¦„ μ°ΎκΈ° ===")
        soup = BeautifulSoup(content, 'html.parser')
        
        students = set()
        
        # λ°©λ²• 1: select μµμ…μ—μ„ ν•™μƒ μ΄λ¦„ μ°ΎκΈ°
        print("1. <select> μµμ…μ—μ„ ν•™μƒ μ΄λ¦„ μ°ΎκΈ°...")
        select_tags = soup.find_all('select')
        for select in select_tags:
            options = select.find_all('option')
            for option in options:
                text = option.get_text(strip=True)
                if text and re.match(r'^[κ°€-ν£]{2,4}$', text):
                    # μΌλ°μ μΈ ν•κµ­ μ΄λ¦„ ν¨ν„΄ (μ„±μ”¨ ν™•μΈ)
                    if text[0] in 'κΉ€μ΄λ°•μµμ •κ°•μ΅°μ¤μ¥μ„μ¤ν•μ‹ μ„κ¶ν™©μ•μ†΅λ¥μ „ν™κ³ λ¬Έμ–‘μ†λ°°λ°±ν—μ λ‚¨μ‹¬λ…Έν•κ³½μ„±μ°¨μ£Όμ°κµ¬μ›λ―Όμ§„μ—„μ±„μ²κ³µν„ν•¨λ³€μ—Όμ—¬μ¶”λ„μ†μ„μ„ μ„¤λ§κΈΈμ—°μ„ν‘λ…κΈ°λ°μ™•κΈμ¥μ΅μΈλ§Ήμ λ¨νƒκµ­μ–΄μ€νΈμ©':
                        students.add(text)
        
        # λ°©λ²• 2: input νƒκ·Έμ valueμ—μ„ ν•™μƒ μ΄λ¦„ μ°ΎκΈ°
        print("2. <input> valueμ—μ„ ν•™μƒ μ΄λ¦„ μ°ΎκΈ°...")
        input_tags = soup.find_all('input')
        for input_tag in input_tags:
            value = input_tag.get('value', '')
            if value and re.match(r'^[κ°€-ν£]{2,4}$', value):
                if value[0] in 'κΉ€μ΄λ°•μµμ •κ°•μ΅°μ¤μ¥μ„μ¤ν•μ‹ μ„κ¶ν™©μ•μ†΅λ¥μ „ν™κ³ λ¬Έμ–‘μ†λ°°λ°±ν—μ λ‚¨μ‹¬λ…Έν•κ³½μ„±μ°¨μ£Όμ°κµ¬μ›λ―Όμ§„μ—„μ±„μ²κ³µν„ν•¨λ³€μ—Όμ—¬μ¶”λ„μ†μ„μ„ μ„¤λ§κΈΈμ—°μ„ν‘λ…κΈ°λ°μ™•κΈμ¥μ΅μΈλ§Ήμ λ¨νƒκµ­μ–΄μ€νΈμ©':
                    students.add(value)
        
        # λ°©λ²• 3: ν…μ΄λΈ” λ°μ΄ν„°μ—μ„ μ΄λ¦„ μ°ΎκΈ°
        print("3. ν…μ΄λΈ” λ°μ΄ν„°μ—μ„ ν•™μƒ μ΄λ¦„ μ°ΎκΈ°...")
        tables = soup.find_all('table')
        for table in tables:
            cells = table.find_all(['td', 'th'])
            for cell in cells:
                text = cell.get_text(strip=True)
                if text and re.match(r'^[κ°€-ν£]{2,4}$', text):
                    if text[0] in 'κΉ€μ΄λ°•μµμ •κ°•μ΅°μ¤μ¥μ„μ¤ν•μ‹ μ„κ¶ν™©μ•μ†΅λ¥μ „ν™κ³ λ¬Έμ–‘μ†λ°°λ°±ν—μ λ‚¨μ‹¬λ…Έν•κ³½μ„±μ°¨μ£Όμ°κµ¬μ›λ―Όμ§„μ—„μ±„μ²κ³µν„ν•¨λ³€μ—Όμ—¬μ¶”λ„μ†μ„μ„ μ„¤λ§κΈΈμ—°μ„ν‘λ…κΈ°λ°μ™•κΈμ¥μ΅μΈλ§Ήμ λ¨νƒκµ­μ–΄μ€νΈμ©':
                        students.add(text)
        
        # λ°©λ²• 4: JavaScript λ³€μμ—μ„ ν•™μƒ μ΄λ¦„ μ°ΎκΈ°
        print("4. JavaScript λ³€μμ—μ„ ν•™μƒ μ΄λ¦„ μ°ΎκΈ°...")
        scripts = soup.find_all('script')
        for script in scripts:
            if script.string:
                script_text = script.string
                # λ¬Έμμ—΄ λ¦¬ν„°λ΄μ—μ„ ν•κµ­ μ΄λ¦„ μ°ΎκΈ°
                string_literals = re.findall(r'["\']([κ°€-ν£]{2,4})["\']', script_text)
                for name in string_literals:
                    if name[0] in 'κΉ€μ΄λ°•μµμ •κ°•μ΅°μ¤μ¥μ„μ¤ν•μ‹ μ„κ¶ν™©μ•μ†΅λ¥μ „ν™κ³ λ¬Έμ–‘μ†λ°°λ°±ν—μ λ‚¨μ‹¬λ…Έν•κ³½μ„±μ°¨μ£Όμ°κµ¬μ›λ―Όμ§„μ—„μ±„μ²κ³µν„ν•¨λ³€μ—Όμ—¬μ¶”λ„μ†μ„μ„ μ„¤λ§κΈΈμ—°μ„ν‘λ…κΈ°λ°μ™•κΈμ¥μ΅μΈλ§Ήμ λ¨νƒκµ­μ–΄μ€νΈμ©':
                        students.add(name)
        
        # λ°©λ²• 5: νΉμ • ν¨ν„΄μΌλ΅ ν•™μƒ λ°μ΄ν„° μ°ΎκΈ°
        print("5. ν•™μƒ λ°μ΄ν„° κµ¬μ΅° ν¨ν„΄ μ°ΎκΈ°...")
        
        # stdinfo_ ν¨ν„΄ μ°ΎκΈ°
        stdinfo_patterns = re.findall(r'stdinfo_([^"\s\'>,\]]+)', content)
        for pattern in stdinfo_patterns:
            # μ«μλ‚ νΉμλ¬Έμκ°€ ν¬ν•¨λμ§€ μ•μ€ ν•κΈ€λ§
            if re.match(r'^[κ°€-ν£]{2,4}$', pattern):
                if pattern[0] in 'κΉ€μ΄λ°•μµμ •κ°•μ΅°μ¤μ¥μ„μ¤ν•μ‹ μ„κ¶ν™©μ•μ†΅λ¥μ „ν™κ³ λ¬Έμ–‘μ†λ°°λ°±ν—μ λ‚¨μ‹¬λ…Έν•κ³½μ„±μ°¨μ£Όμ°κµ¬μ›λ―Όμ§„μ—„μ±„μ²κ³µν„ν•¨λ³€μ—Όμ—¬μ¶”λ„μ†μ„μ„ μ„¤λ§κΈΈμ—°μ„ν‘λ…κΈ°λ°μ™•κΈμ¥μ΅μΈλ§Ήμ λ¨νƒκµ­μ–΄μ€νΈμ©':
                    students.add(pattern)
        
        # λ°©λ²• 6: STUDENT_NAME μ†μ„±κ°’ μ°ΎκΈ°
        print("6. STUDENT_NAME μ†μ„±κ°’ μ°ΎκΈ°...")
        student_name_patterns = re.findall(r'STUDENT_NAME["\s]*[=:]["\s]*([κ°€-ν£]{2,4})', content)
        for name in student_name_patterns:
            if name[0] in 'κΉ€μ΄λ°•μµμ •κ°•μ΅°μ¤μ¥μ„μ¤ν•μ‹ μ„κ¶ν™©μ•μ†΅λ¥μ „ν™κ³ λ¬Έμ–‘μ†λ°°λ°±ν—μ λ‚¨μ‹¬λ…Έν•κ³½μ„±μ°¨μ£Όμ°κµ¬μ›λ―Όμ§„μ—„μ±„μ²κ³µν„ν•¨λ³€μ—Όμ—¬μ¶”λ„μ†μ„μ„ μ„¤λ§κΈΈμ—°μ„ν‘λ…κΈ°λ°μ™•κΈμ¥μ΅μΈλ§Ήμ λ¨νƒκµ­μ–΄μ€νΈμ©':
                students.add(name)
        
        # λ°©λ²• 7: λ°μ΄ν„° λ°°μ—΄μ—μ„ μ΄λ¦„ μ°ΎκΈ°
        print("7. λ°μ΄ν„° λ°°μ—΄ ν¨ν„΄ μ°ΎκΈ°...")
        # λ°°μ—΄μ΄λ‚ κ°μ²΄ ν•νƒλ΅ μ €μ¥λ ν•™μƒ λ°μ΄ν„° μ°ΎκΈ°
        array_patterns = re.findall(r'\[([^\]]*[κ°€-ν£]{2,4}[^\]]*)\]', content)
        for pattern in array_patterns:
            names_in_array = re.findall(r'[κ°€-ν£]{2,4}', pattern)
            for name in names_in_array:
                if name[0] in 'κΉ€μ΄λ°•μµμ •κ°•μ΅°μ¤μ¥μ„μ¤ν•μ‹ μ„κ¶ν™©μ•μ†΅λ¥μ „ν™κ³ λ¬Έμ–‘μ†λ°°λ°±ν—μ λ‚¨μ‹¬λ…Έν•κ³½μ„±μ°¨μ£Όμ°κµ¬μ›λ―Όμ§„μ—„μ±„μ²κ³µν„ν•¨λ³€μ—Όμ—¬μ¶”λ„μ†μ„μ„ μ„¤λ§κΈΈμ—°μ„ν‘λ…κΈ°λ°μ™•κΈμ¥μ΅μΈλ§Ήμ λ¨νƒκµ­μ–΄μ€νΈμ©':
                    students.add(name)
        
        # κ²°κ³Ό μ •λ¦¬
        valid_students = []
        
        # μ‹μ¤ν… μ©μ–΄ μ μ™Έ
        system_words = {
            'κ°•μ‚¬', 'κ΄€λ¦¬', 'μ„ νƒ', 'μ „μ²΄', 'μ—†μ', 'κΈ°νƒ€', 'λ“±λ΅', 'μ‚­μ ', 'μμ •', 
            'ν™•μΈ', 'μ·¨μ†', 'μ €μ¥', 'μ΅°ν', 'κ²€μƒ‰', 'μ¶λ ¥', 'μΈμ‡„', 'λ³µμ‚¬', 'ν•™μ›', 
            'ν•™μƒ', 'μ„ μƒ', 'λ¶€λ¨', 'λ³΄νΈ', 'μ—°λ½', 'μ „ν™”', 'λ¬Έμ', 'μ‹κ°„', 'λ¶„μ„', 
            'ν†µκ³„', 'ν„ν™©', 'μƒνƒ', 'μ •λ³΄', 'λ°μ΄ν„°', 'μ‹μ¤ν…', 'ν™”λ©΄', 'νμ΄μ§€', 
            'λ©”λ‰΄', 'λ²„νΌ', 'ν΄λ¦­', 'μ…λ ¥', 'μ¶λ ¥', 'νμΌ', 'μ„¤μ •', 'ν™κ²½', 'μµμ…',

#!/usr/bin/env python3
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
"""
μ •ν™•ν 81λ…μ ν•™μƒ μ΄λ¦„ μ¶”μ¶ν•κΈ°
"""

import re
import json
from bs4 import BeautifulSoup

def extract_exactly_81_students():
    try:
        with open('attendance_page_debug.html', 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f:
            content = f.read()
        
        print("=== μ •ν™•ν 81λ…μ ν•™μƒ μ΄λ¦„ μ°ΎκΈ° ===")
        
        # λ°©λ²• 1: ν•™μƒ μ ν‘μ‹ μ°ΎκΈ°
        student_count_patterns = re.findall(r'(\d+)\s*λ…', content)
        print(f"νμ΄μ§€μ—μ„ λ°κ²¬λ μ«μ + 'λ…' ν¨ν„΄λ“¤: {set(student_count_patterns)}")
        
        # λ°©λ²• 2: JavaScript λ°°μ—΄μ—μ„ μ •ν™•ν• ν•™μƒ λ°μ΄ν„° μ°ΎκΈ°
        print("\n=== JavaScript ν•™μƒ λ°μ΄ν„° λ°°μ—΄ λ¶„μ„ ===")
        
        # studentInfo λ°°μ—΄ μΈλ±μ¤ μ°ΎκΈ°
        student_indices = re.findall(r'studentInfo\[(\d+)\]', content)
        if student_indices:
            max_index = max(int(idx) for idx in student_indices)
            print(f"studentInfo λ°°μ—΄ μµλ€ μΈλ±μ¤: {max_index} (μ΄ {max_index + 1}κ° μ¬λ΅―)")
        
        # λ°©λ²• 3: λ” μ—„κ²©ν• ν•„ν„°λ§μΌλ΅ μ‹¤μ  ν•™μƒ μ΄λ¦„λ§ μ¶”μ¶
        print("\n=== μ—„κ²©ν• ν•„ν„°λ§μΌλ΅ μ‹¤μ  ν•™μƒ μ΄λ¦„ μ¶”μ¶ ===")
        
        # λ¨λ“  ν•κΈ€ ν¨ν„΄ μ¶”μ¶
        all_korean = re.findall(r'[κ°€-ν£]{2,4}', content)
        
        # λ§¤μ° μ—„κ²©ν• ν•„ν„°λ§
        definitely_not_names = {
            # μ‹κ°„ κ΄€λ ¨
            'μ¤μ „', 'μ¤ν›„', 'μ‹κ°„', 'λ¶„μ„', 'ν†µκ³„', 'ν„ν™©', 'κΈμΌ', 'μ–΄μ ', 'λ‚΄μΌ', 'μ¤λ',
